dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class CellEditorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.CellEditorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dreisoft.tresos.lib2.ui.tree.ICellEditorFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTableRowCellEditorFactory, AbstractTreeTableRowCellEditorFactory, ComboBoxCellEditorFactory

    public class CellEditorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements dreisoft.tresos.lib2.ui.tree.ICellEditorFactory
    A CellEditorFactory is used by a table column to provide a customized CellEditor for cells in a SWTTable or SWTTreeTable.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

      • doCreateCellEditor

        public org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CellEditor doCreateCellEditor(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
        Creates and returns the cell editor for the column to which this class belongs. This method may be overwritten with a custom implementation. The default implementation retuns a subclass of TextCellEditor which uses the SWTColumnDescription of this cell editor factory to verify the value.
        Specified by:
        doCreateCellEditor in interface dreisoft.tresos.lib2.ui.tree.ICellEditorFactory
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent control for the cell editor
        Returns:
        the cell editor instance
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doConvertCellValueToEditorValue

        public java.lang.Object doConvertCellValueToEditorValue(java.lang.String value)
        Converts the value of a cell to an editable representation. This method may be overridden. The default implementation returns the value in the same format as used for viewing.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted object
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doConvertEditorValueToCellValue

        public java.lang.String doConvertEditorValueToCellValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Converts the edited value to the cell value. This method may be overridden. The default implementation returns just the value.
        Parameters:
        value - the object to convert
        Returns:
        the converted value
        Since:
        2009.a
